title: Alexios' Fate
description: Seduced by a king, pursued by the god Apollo, and wooed by his slave, can Alexios escape his fate and find love?Mature King Lykos has a sexy confidence that turns Alexios' head. Seduced by Lykos, Prince Alexios discovers a world of men he's never known before.Meanwhile his slave Galen has gotten tired of waiting in the wings. He sets out to woo Alexios and win his heart.Even Apollo can't leave Alexios alone. The young prince finds himself pursued by a god and in danger of a perilous love.How will Alexios follow his heart when he unwittingly wins the favor of a god? Can Alexios escape the fate of Apollo's past lovers and have the man he wants?
author: Kayla Jameth
